009package Ch14_ColorimetricColor;
010
011import java.awt.color.ICC_ColorSpace;
012import java.awt.color.ICC_Profile;
013import java.awt.color.ICC_ProfileRGB;
014import java.io.IOException;
015
016import ij.IJ;
017import ij.io.OpenDialog;
018import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
019import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
020import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
021
022
023/**
024 * This plugin lists a user-selected ICC profile file
025 * to the console.
026 * TODO: add illustrative application of color profile
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 *
030 */
031public class ICC_Profile_From_File implements PlugIn {
032
033        @Override
034        public void run(String arg0) {
035                
036                String path = askForOpenPath("Select an ICC profile file (.icc or .icm)");
037//              String path = IjUtils.askForOpenPath("Select an ICC profile file (.icc or .icm)");
038                if (path == null) return;
039                
040                IJ.log("path = " + path);
041                ICC_Profile iccProfile = null;
042                
043                try {iccProfile = ICC_ProfileRGB.getInstance(path);
044                } catch (IOException e) {}
045                
046                if (iccProfile == null) {
047                        IJ.error("Could not open ICC profile file " + path);
048                        return;
049                }
050                
051                PrintPrecision.set(5);
052                
053                ICC_ColorSpace iccColorSpace = new ICC_ColorSpace(iccProfile);
054                int nComp = iccColorSpace.getNumComponents();
055                if (nComp != 3) {
056                        IJ.error("Color space must have 3 components, this one has " + nComp);
057                        return;
058                }
059                
060                IJ.log("color space class = " + iccColorSpace.getClass().getSimpleName());
061                IJ.log("color space type = " + iccColorSpace.getType());
062                IJ.log("color space ncomp = " + iccColorSpace.getNumComponents());
063                
064        
065                // specify a device-specific color:
066                float[] deviceColor = {0.77f, 0.13f, 0.89f};
067                //float[] deviceColor = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
068                IJ.log("device color = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
069                
070                // convert to sRGB:
071                float[] sRGBColor = iccColorSpace.toRGB(deviceColor);
072                IJ.log("sRGB = " + Matrix.toString(sRGBColor));
073                
074                // convert to (D50-based) XYZ:
075                float[] XYZColor = iccColorSpace.toCIEXYZ(deviceColor);
076                IJ.log("XYZ = " + Matrix.toString(XYZColor));
077                
078                deviceColor = iccColorSpace.fromRGB(sRGBColor);
079                IJ.log("device color direct (check) = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
080                
081                deviceColor = iccColorSpace.fromCIEXYZ(XYZColor);
082                IJ.log("device color via XYZ (check) = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
083                
084                // list sRGB Values:
085                for (int ri = 0; ri <= 10; ri++) {
086                        for (int gi = 0; gi <= 10; gi++) {
087                                for (int bi = 0; bi <= 10; bi++) {
088                                        float[] devCol = {ri * 0.1f, gi * 0.1f, bi * 0.1f};
089                                        float[] sRGB = iccColorSpace.toRGB(devCol);
090                                        IJ.log(Matrix.toString(devCol) + " -> " + Matrix.toString(sRGB));
091                                }
092                        }
093                }
094        }
095        
096        /**
097         * Queries the user for an arbitrary file to be opened.
098         * TODO: replace by IJ.open()?
099         *  
100         * @param title string to be shown in the interaction window.
101         * @return path of the selected resource.
102         */
103        private String askForOpenPath(String title) {
104                OpenDialog od = new OpenDialog(title, "");
105                String dir = od.getDirectory();
106                String name = od.getFileName();
107                if (name == null)
108                        return null;
109                return encodeURL(dir + name);
110        }
111        
112        private static String encodeURL(String url) {
113                //url = url.replaceAll(" ","%20");      // this doesn't work with spaces
114                url = url.replace('\\','/');
115                return url;
116        }
117
118}
